sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello,2➛Refund Request Record➛Requested for

We are sending you that email to let you know that you refund request number 2➛Refund Request Record➛Number was reproved by your manager.

Hello,2➛Refund Request Record➛Requested for

We are sending you that email to let you know that you refund request number 2➛Refund Request Record➛Number was completed by the Personnel Department and your refund is already available.

sys_variable_value.value: Refund request reproved by Finance Department

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello,2➛Refund Request Record➛Requested for

We are sending you that email to let you know that you refund request number 2➛Refund Request Record➛Number was reproved by the Finance Department.

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello,2➛Refund Request Record➛Requested for

We are sending you that email to let you know that you refund request number 2➛Refund Request Record➛Number was completed by the Personnel Department and your refund is already available.

Hello,2➛Refund Request Record➛Requested for

We are sending you that email to let you know that you refund request number 2➛Refund Request Record➛Number was reproved by your manager.

sys_variable_value.value: Refund request reproved by Finance Department

sys_element_mapping.value:
Hello,2➛Refund Request Record➛Requested for

We are sending you that email to let you know that you refund request number 2➛Refund Request Record➛Number was reproved by the Finance Department.
